00071         OSCL_IMPORT_REF virtual void enablenullpointerreturn();
00072 
00075         virtual ~OsclMemPoolFixedChunkAllocator()
00076         {
00077             // Decrement the ref count
00078             --iRefCount;
00079 
00080             // If ref count reaches 0 then destroy this object
00081             if (iRefCount <= 0)
00082             {
00083                 destroymempool();
00084             }
00085         }

00296         struct MemPoolBlockInfo;
00297 
00298         struct MemPoolBufferInfo
00299         {
00300             uint32 iBufferPreFence;     // Pre-fence to check for memory corruption
00301             OsclAny* iStartAddr;        // Starting memory address of the memory pool buffer after the buffer info
00302             OsclAny* iEndAddr;          // Ending memory address of the memory pool buffer
00303             uint32 iBufferSize;         // Total size of the memory pool buffer including the buffer info header
00304             uint32 iNumOutstanding;     // Number of outstanding blocks from this memory pool buffer
00305             MemPoolBlockInfo* iNextFreeBlock; // Pointer to the next free memory block
00306             uint32 iAllocatedSz;        //Number of butes allocated from the mempool
00307             uint32 iBufferPostFence;    // Post-fence to check for memory corruption
00308         };
00309 
00310         struct MemPoolBlockInfo
00311         {
00312             uint32 iBlockPreFence;      // Pre-fence to check for memory corruption
00313             MemPoolBlockInfo* iNextFreeBlock; // Pointer to the next (right neighbor) free block in the buffer. NULL if none.
00314             MemPoolBlockInfo* iPrevFreeBlock; // Pointer to the previous (left neighbor) free block in the buffer. NULL if first free block
00315             uint32 iBlockSize;          // Total size of the block including the block info header
00316             uint8* iBlockBuffer;        // Pointer to the buffer area of the block
00317             MemPoolBufferInfo* iParentBuffer; // Pointer to the block's parent memory pool buffer
00318             uint32 iBlockPostFence;     // Post-fence to check for memory corruption
00319         };
00320 
00321     protected:
00322 
00325         virtual ~OsclMemPoolResizableAllocator()
00326         {
00327             destroyallmempoolbuffers();
00328         }
